description:
It had been a while since I'd seen Topher. After he got his dick sucked by Barry, I figured that was it. All the "girlfriend" talk made me think we'd hit the end of the road.
But you never know!
I'm not sure what the circumstances were, but Topher gave me a call and said he was ready!
I thought that muscular Mitch would be a good choice to break him in!
Afterwards, our camera guy asked, "How did it feel cumming with a dick up your ass?"
"Pretty good," he said. "I could get used to it actually!"
title: Topher & Mitch
